modName: Requiem - Ursine Armor Pack By Bizous
summary: Patch to Ursine Armor Pack by Deserter X for Requiem
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys

First , sorry for my bad english isn't my native language.

This is a patch to Ursine Armor Pack by Deserter X for Requiem.
Original mod : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?
- Do not need the original file for this patch.

What are the modifications ?

- Remove chest
- Craftable on Forge , Hide Categorie , with Advanced Light Armor Perk (Stat balanced for this perk)


For others informations go to the original file : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?

Don't forget to Endorse both files please !

----------------------
Credit

Nsk13
Ugerboss
----------------------
